data.title: GolfBC
data.text:
Happy Canada Day and 4th of July!

Long days and warm weather are here, meaning golf's peak season is officially underway! Summer time is family time, and GolfBC has many Family-fun programs designed to make the most of your time together. From our popular Kids Play Free program (kids play free with paying adult), to Quik Tees (forward tees so the whole family of all abilities can play together), to lesson programs and camps for all ages, we're sure to have something for the whole family!

Still plenty of tee times left for this weekend. Start the first long-weekend of the summer right by hitting the links (or a patio) at one of 7 GolfBC locations.

Book Online for Best Rates!

Celebrate Canada... all month long!

Canada "Day" Special at Furry Creek! Celebrate all month long, book online using the promo code 'CANADA' and save 20% on regular daily green fees.

Cannot be combined with other offers or applied to already discounted rounds, book online for best available rates.

Book Now

More Canada Day Festivities

Patio weather is back! Celebrate Canada Day at Nicklaus North and Table Nineteen. Enjoy Canadian-themed food and drink specials and LIVE MUSIC on the patio all weekend long (Friday-Sunday). Featured local artists include Rachel Thom (Friday, 5-8pm), Sean Rose (Saturday, 12-3pm), and Jon Shrier (Sunday, 3-6pm).

Golf Shop Canada Day SALE - pop and save! Spend over $75 on retail and pop a balloon to receive 15-45% off. Sale runs Friday - Sunday.

Table Nineteen Menus & Reservations

Golf and Tennis Camp

Arbutus Ridge

The GBC Golf Academy is home to a growing Junior Program which features lesson options for young golfers just getting started in golf all the way up to high school players looking to attend university on golf scholarships.

Camps run July and August, Monday to Friday from 9am-12pm and include two hours of golf instruction, one hour of tennis and lunch each day. Age Grouping: Novice, Intermediate, Advanced. Golf Clubs provided (if nessesary). Full day camps available, call the golf shop for more information!

View all Junior Programs

THANK YOU from GolfBC and Gallagher's Canyon

We would like to extend our gratitude to everyone who helped make the inaugural GolfBC Championship event happen, especially the 300+ volunteers and all the spectators who came out- rain or shine- to support! Congratulations to Dan McCarthy (who is still at the top of the money list with CAD$73,938 including 2 wins and 2 Top 10 finishes!). Charity was also a huge winner, with a total of $150,000 raised for the BC Cancer Foundation!

Visit website for photos and articles!
